text: The 1970 Soviet Class A First Group was a transitional season of the future Soviet First League. It was also the 30th season of the Soviet second tier league competition. The league was reduced to a single group in comparison with the previous season. ==Final standings== ==See also== * Soviet First League ==External links== * 1970 season. RSSSF 1970 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1970 Soviet Class A First Group
